quotes.quote: Once in a while you get a moment of clarity an inspiration and they don't come that frequently.
It's a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.
Mystification is simple; clarity is the hardest thing of all.
There are few things more powerful than a life lived with passionate clarity.
Having knowledge but lacking the power to express it clearly is no better than never having any ideas at all.

Perfect clarity would profit the intellect but damage the will.
A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.
You get clarity as you get sober, and you get clarity as you get older.
A few times in my life I've had moments of clarity where the silence drowns out the noise and I can feel rather than think.
Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts.
